trans-unit.source: Thrown when a thread on which an operation should execute no longer exists or has no message loop.
trans-unit.target: 應該在其執行作業的執行緒不存在，或沒有訊息迴圈時擲回。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException"></xref> class with the specified detailed description.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException"></xref>類別具有指定詳細描述。

trans-unit.source: A detailed description of the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException"></xref> class with the given <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException"></xref>類別指定<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to be used for deserialization.
The destination to be used for deserialization.
trans-unit.target: 要用於還原序列化的目的地。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException"></xref> class with the specified detailed description and the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException"></xref>具有指定詳細的描述和指定的例外狀況類別。

trans-unit.source: A detailed description of the error.
A reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況參考。
